org.treetank.service.xml.diff.algorithm.fmes

Class Matching

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.service.xml.diff.algorithm.fmes.Matching

  • public final class Matching
extends Object
    Keeps track of nodes in a matching.
    Author:
    Johannes Lichtenberger, University of Konstanz

        Adds the matching x -> y.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(INode paramNodeX,
               INode paramNodeY)
        Checks if the matching contains the pair (x, y).
        Parameters:
        paramNodeX - source node
        paramNodeY - partner of x
        Returns:
        true iff add(x, y) was invoked first

      • containedChildren

        public long containedChildren(INode paramNodeX,
                     INode paramNodeY)
                       throws TTIOException
        Counts the number of child nodes in the subtrees of x and y that are also in the matching.
        Parameters:
        paramNodeX - first subtree root node
        paramNodeY - second subtree root node
        Returns:
        number of children which have been matched
        Throws:
        TTIOException

      • partner

        public INode partner(INode paramNode)
        Returns the partner node of node according to mapping.
        Parameters:
        paramNode - node for which a partner has to be found
        Returns:
        the other node or null

      • reversePartner

        public INode reversePartner(INode paramNode)
        Returns the node for which "node" is the partner.
        Parameters:
        paramNode - node for which a reverse partner has to be found
        Returns:
        x iff add(x, node) was called before
